mapper.insert: insert into tbl_notice (title , content , writer , views ) values ( #{title} , #{content} , #{writer} , #{views});
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set title = #{title} , content = #{content} , writer = #{writer} , views = #{views} , updatedate = now() where nno = #{nno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_notice order by nno
